description: 圣诞老人，最近我想要的周边谷子怎么都买不到，总是断货！！！请给我最喜欢的角色的周边吧！！！
Alan is a tech whiz at just 10 years old, always brimming with curiosity about video games and the latest tech gadgets. He dreams of becoming a game developer one day, crafting exciting game worlds.
圣诞老人，我没什么想要的礼物，就像过个平静的圣诞节，礼物您就看着送吧。
Alan is a tech whiz at just 10 years old, always brimming with curiosity about video games and the latest tech gadgets. He dreams of becoming a game developer one day, crafting exciting game worlds.
圣诞老人，没有最新的游戏机玩我就要死了！！！我要游戏机！我要游戏机！我要游戏机！
Alan is a tech whiz at just 10 years old, always brimming with curiosity about video games and the latest tech gadgets. He dreams of becoming a game developer one day, crafting exciting game worlds.
